title: Mike Myers reacts to Verne Troyer's death at 'Terminal' premiere
text:
Mike Myers reacts to Verne Troyer's death at 'Terminal' premiere 3:12am IST - 01:33
Mike Myers talks about the future of the 'Austin Powers' franchise after the death of his Mini Me co-star Verne Troyer. Rollo Ross reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
Mike Myers talks about the future of the 'Austin Powers' franchise after the death of his Mini Me co-star Verne Troyer. Rollo Ross reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2KQjlAj
